00036 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00037 uint8_t syncmenu[] = "AutoBaudrate Status: Synchronous! \n\r";
00038 uint8_t menu1[] = "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r";
00039 uint8_t menu2[] =
00040 "UART Auto Baudrate demo\n\r\t "
00041 "MCU LPC17xx - ARM Cortex-M3 \n\r\t "
00042 "UART0 - Auto Baud rate mode used \n\r";
00043 uint8_t menu3[] = "UART demo terminated!\n";

00045 /* Synchronous Flag */
00046 __IO FlagStatus Synchronous;
00047

00053 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00054 /*********************************************************************/
00059 void UART0_IRQHandler(void)
00060 {
00061         // Call Standard UART 0 interrupt handler
00062         uint32_t intsrc, tmp, tmp1;
00063 
00064         /* Determine the interrupt source */
00065         intsrc = UART_GetIntId(LPC_UART0);
00066         tmp = intsrc & UART_IIR_INTID_MASK;
00067 
00068         // Receive Line Status
00069         if (tmp == UART_IIR_INTID_RLS){
00070                 // Check line status
00071                 tmp1 = UART_GetLineStatus(LPC_UART0);
00072                 // Mask out the Receive Ready and Transmit Holding empty status
00073                 tmp1 &= (UART_LSR_OE | UART_LSR_PE | UART_LSR_FE \
00074                                 | UART_LSR_BI | UART_LSR_RXFE);
00075                 // If any error exist
00076                 if (tmp1) {
00077 
00078                         while(tmp1){
00079                                 ; //implement error handling here
00080                         }
00081                 }
00082         }
00083 
00084 
00085         intsrc &= (UART_IIR_ABEO_INT | UART_IIR_ABTO_INT);
00086         // Check if End of auto-baudrate interrupt or Auto baudrate time out
00087         if (intsrc){
00088                 // Clear interrupt pending
00089                 if(intsrc & UART_IIR_ABEO_INT)
00090                         UART_ABClearIntPending(LPC_UART0, UART_AUTOBAUD_INTSTAT_ABEO);
00091                 if (intsrc & UART_IIR_ABTO_INT)
00092                         UART_ABClearIntPending(LPC_UART0, UART_AUTOBAUD_INTSTAT_ABTO);
00093                         if (Synchronous == RESET)
00094                         {
00095                                 /* Interrupt caused by End of auto-baud */
00096                                 if (intsrc & UART_AUTOBAUD_INTSTAT_ABEO){
00097                                         // Disable AB interrupt
00098                                         UART_IntConfig(LPC_UART0, UART_INTCFG_ABEO, DISABLE);
00099                                         // Set Sync flag
00100                                         Synchronous = SET;
00101                                 }
00102 
00103                                 /* Auto-Baudrate Time-Out interrupt (not implemented) */
00104                                 if (intsrc & UART_AUTOBAUD_INTSTAT_ABTO) {
00105                                         /* Just clear this bit - Add your code here */
00106                                         UART_ABClearIntPending(LPC_UART0, UART_AUTOBAUD_INTSTAT_ABTO);
00107                                 }
00108                         }
00109         }
00110 }

00119 void print_menu(void)
00120 {
00121         UART_Send(LPC_UART0, menu1, sizeof(menu1), BLOCKING);
00122         UART_Send(LPC_UART0, menu2, sizeof(menu2), BLOCKING);
00123 }

00125 
00126 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00127 /*********************************************************************/
00132 int c_entry(void)
00133 {
00134         // UART Configuration structure variable
00135         UART_CFG_Type UARTConfigStruct;
00136         // UART FIFO configuration Struct variable
00137         UART_FIFO_CFG_Type UARTFIFOConfigStruct;
00138         // Pin configuration for UART0
00139         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00140         // Auto baudrate configuration structure
00141         UART_AB_CFG_Type ABConfig;
00142 
00143         uint32_t idx, len;
00144         __IO FlagStatus exitflag;
00145         uint8_t buffer[10];
00146 
00147         /*
00148          * Initialize UART0 pin connect
00149          */
00150         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00151         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00152         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00153         PinCfg.Pinnum = 2;
00154         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00155         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00156         PinCfg.Pinnum = 3;
00157         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00158 
00159         /* Initialize UART Configuration parameter structure to default state:
00160          * Baudrate = 9600bps
00161          * 8 data bit
00162          * 1 Stop bit
00163          * None parity
00164          */
00165         UART_ConfigStructInit(&UARTConfigStruct);
00166 
00167         /* Initialize UART0 peripheral with given to corresponding parameter
00168          * in this case, don't care the baudrate value UART initialized
00169          * since this will be determine when running auto baudrate
00170          */
00171         UART_Init(LPC_UART0, &UARTConfigStruct);
00172 
00173         /* Initialize FIFOConfigStruct to default state:
00174          *                              - FIFO_DMAMode = DISABLE
00175          *                              - FIFO_Level = UART_FIFO_TRGLEV0
00176          *                              - FIFO_ResetRxBuf = ENABLE
00177          *                              - FIFO_ResetTxBuf = ENABLE
00178          *                              - FIFO_State = ENABLE
00179          */
00180         UART_FIFOConfigStructInit(&UARTFIFOConfigStruct);
00181 
00182         // Initialize FIFO for UART0 peripheral
00183         UART_FIFOConfig(LPC_UART0, &UARTFIFOConfigStruct);
00184 
00185 
00186         // Enable UART Transmit
00187         UART_TxCmd(LPC_UART0, ENABLE);
00188 
00189 
00190     /* Enable UART End of Auto baudrate interrupt */
00191         UART_IntConfig(LPC_UART0, UART_INTCFG_ABEO, ENABLE);
00192         /* Enable UART Auto baudrate timeout interrupt */
00193         UART_IntConfig(LPC_UART0, UART_INTCFG_ABTO, ENABLE);
00194 
00195     /* preemption = 1, sub-priority = 1 */
00196     NVIC_SetPriority(UART0_IRQn, ((0x01<<3)|0x01));
00197         /* Enable Interrupt for UART0 channel */
00198     NVIC_EnableIRQ(UART0_IRQn);
00199 
00200 
00201 /* ---------------------- Auto baud rate section ----------------------- */
00202         // Reset Synchronous flag for auto-baudrate mode
00203         Synchronous = RESET;
00204 
00205         // Configure Auto baud rate mode
00206     ABConfig.ABMode = UART_AUTOBAUD_MODE0;
00207     ABConfig.AutoRestart = ENABLE;
00208 
00209     // Start auto baudrate mode
00210     UART_ABCmd(LPC_UART0, &ABConfig, ENABLE);
00211     print_menu();
00212 
00213     /* Loop until auto baudrate mode complete */
00214     while (Synchronous == RESET);
00215 
00216 
00217     // Print status of auto baudrate
00218     UART_Send(LPC_UART0, syncmenu, sizeof(syncmenu), BLOCKING);
00219 /* ---------------------- End of Auto baud rate section ----------------------- */
00220 
00221         // print welcome screen
00222         print_menu();
00223 
00224         // reset exit flag
00225         exitflag = RESET;
00226 
00227     /* Read some data from the buffer */
00228     while (exitflag == RESET)
00229     {
00230        len = 0;
00231         while (len == 0)
00232         {
00233             len = UART_Receive(LPC_UART0, buffer, sizeof(buffer), NONE_BLOCKING);
00234         }
00235 
00236         /* Got some data */
00237         idx = 0;
00238         while (idx < len)
00239         {
00240             if (buffer[idx] == 27)
00241             {
00242                 /* ESC key, set exit flag */
00243                 UART_Send(LPC_UART0, menu3, sizeof(menu3), BLOCKING);
00244                 exitflag = SET;
00245             }
00246             else if (buffer[idx] == 'r')
00247             {
00248                 print_menu();
00249             }
00250             else
00251             {
00252                 /* Echo it back */
00253                 UART_Send(LPC_UART0, &buffer[idx], 1, BLOCKING);
00254             }
00255             idx++;
00256         }
00257     }
00258 
00259     // wait for current transmission complete - THR must be empty
00260     while (UART_CheckBusy(LPC_UART0) == SET);
00261 
00262     // DeInitialize UART0 peripheral
00263     UART_DeInit(LPC_UART0);
00264 
00265     /* Loop forever */
00266     while(1);
00267     return 1;
00268 }
00269 
00270 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00271    allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00272    heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00273    toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00274    file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00275 int main(void)
00276 {
00277     return c_entry();
00278 }
